name: seo-worker
description: Cloudflare Worker for SEO-optimized static page generation

scripts.kv:create: wrangler kv namespace create SEO_PAGES --env production
scripts.kv:list: wrangler kv key list --binding SEO_PAGES --env production
scripts.kv:get: wrangler kv key get --binding SEO_PAGES --env production
scripts.kv:delete: wrangler kv key delete --binding SEO_PAGES --env production

author: Vegvisr
